mapper.sql: id, create_date, update_date, data_status, desp, reason, content, mobile, waybill_id, shipper_id, transporter_id, attachment_id_1, attachment_id_2, attachment_id_3, attachment_id_4, shipper_company_id, transporter_company_id
mapper.select: select a.id, a.reason, a.mobile,a.content as content, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.api.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',b.attachment_link) as attachmentId1Link, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.api.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',c.attachment_link) as attachmentId2Link, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.api.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',d.attachment_link) as attachmentId3Link, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.api.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',e.attachment_link) as attachmentId4Link from t_complaint a left join t_attachment b on a.attachment_id_1 = b.id left join t_attachment c on a.attachment_id_2 = c.id left join t_attachment d on a.attachment_id_3 = d.id left join t_attachment e on a.attachment_id_3 = d.id where a.waybill_id = #{waybillId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.shipper_id = #{shipperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_complaint (id, update_date, desp, reason, content, mobile, waybill_id, shipper_id, transporter_id, attachment_id_1, attachment_id_2, attachment_id_3, attachment_id_4, shipper_company_id, transporter_company_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waybillId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transporterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentId3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentId4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipperCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transporterCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update t_complaint
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
data_status = #{dataStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
desp = #{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
waybill_id = #{waybillId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shipper_id = #{shipperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transporter_id = #{transporterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attachment_id_1 = #{attachmentId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attachment_id_2 = #{attachmentId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attachment_id_3 = #{attachmentId3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attachment_id_4 = #{attachmentId4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shipper_company_id = #{shipperCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transporter_company_id = #{transporterCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_complaint set create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, data_status = #{dataStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, desp = #{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, waybill_id = #{waybillId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipper_id = #{shipperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transporter_id = #{transporterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment_id_1 = #{attachmentId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment_id_2 = #{attachmentId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment_id_3 = #{attachmentId3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment_id_4 = #{attachmentId4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipper_company_id = #{shipperCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transporter_company_id = #{transporterCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
